snippet: The program, known as EcoAd, is being joined by EducationAd and WellnessAd; in which a portion of money that is spent by marketers on advertising is donated to nonprofit organizations.
abstract: The program, known as EcoAd, is being joined by EducationAd and WellnessAd; in which a portion of money that is spent by marketers on advertising is donated to nonprofit organizations.

headline.main: CBS 'Green' Marketing Program to Expand to Education and Healthy Diet
